com.example.socket_adk

Class AbstractServerListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.socket_adk.AbstractServerListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ServerListener

    public class AbstractServerListener
extends java.lang.Object
implements ServerListener
    Base class for implementing a ServerListener. Extend this class to capture a subset of the server events.
    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    v5.0
    Author:
    Shmulik Melamed, Lital Motola
